page.title: 07Athletics Club
page.content: After school we have an Athletics club.The teacher(Mr.Ladd) chooses what we do.Usually we do the jumps like {high jump, long jump}and the{triple {jump}but sometimes we do the{track {events.}I(Justin Coombes aged 11) hold the school record for the long and triple jumps but I am too short to beat the high jump record.(I am 120cm. I have jumped my height, 2cm. short of the record.) The club is very good because it loosens my muscles and makes me feel fitter.It runs from 3.45 to 5p.m. Then my Dad or a friend picks me up in the car. Our school is only a primary one and because of this we don't do things like shot putt, javelin or pole vault and I think it's a great pity.
